name: 8 ball pool - 8 ball billiards
description:
8 Ball Pool Offline Free - Billiards Offline Free 2021- World Championhip 2021 - The World's #1 Pool game !

Welcome to Pool 8 Pro - Billiards Offline - Pool Offline 2021 ! How about a nice little game of pool? This is the No. 1 Pool game on the market and completely FREE.
Refine your skills in the practice arena, take on the world in 1-vs-1 matches, or enter tournaments to win trophies and exclusive cues!
Customize your cue and table! In every competitive 1-vs-1 match you play, there’ll be Pool Coins at stake – win the match and the Coins are yours. You can use these to enter higher ranked matches with bigger stakes, or to buy new items in the Pool Shop.
8 Ball Pool’s level system means you’re always facing a challenge. Play matches to increase your ranking and get access to more exclusive match locations, where you play against only the best Pool players.

Game features:
- Animated realistic 3D shadows
- Touch control to move the stick
- 8, 9 attractive ball pool
- Mutiplayer: 2 player, 3, 4 player
- Many attractive game modes:
- Players vs. Computers / Players
- Challenges (limited to 2 minutes with high performance)
- Practice (no time limit but no high score)
- Extremely intelligent AI, upgraded by each level

How to play:
Player vs. Computer / Player
Play against the AI ​​/ Player computer with standard 8 ball rule. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the source in RIGHT to attack. Touch and hold at any point to move the cue ball and touch to confirm for Free Ball.

Completely free!

Any questions please leave a comment! Thank you !
